document.full_text: following the example of manal al-sharif, a saudi activist arrested this week for encouraging women to defy saudi arabia's ban on women drivers, several other women there have posted videos of themselves behind the wheel on facebook.
document.title: the lede: more saudi women record driving videos
lines_and_colors: following the example of manal al-sharif, a saudi activist arrested this week for encouraging women to defy saudi arabia's ban on women drivers, several other women there have posted videos of themselves behind the wheel on facebook.
